item.description:
The Optimum Health Solution/Raw New England Community Dinner Speaker Series is delighted to feature:

Tommy Priester: "Herbs & Wild Edibles Nourish and Heal"
* Emergency First Aid with Common Plants and Herbs
* Green Energy Healing - Properties of Greens & Wild Edibles
* Save money by getting delicious greens & herbal medicinals from your own yard

Details:
* Registration - 5:30
* Rawbert Reid: Fabulous Food Demo. - 6 pm Rawbert Reid is chef owner of Rawbert's Cafe
* Gourmet Plant-Based "Living Food" Potluck - 6:15 pm
* Presentation and Q and A 7:15 - 8:45 pm

You will learn to use herbs to heal all sorts of accute injuries, viruses, colds flu's, sprains, cuts, bruises, histeria, shock and all kinds of traumas, with simple plants, herbs and homeopathics remedies.

Tommy Priester is a Clinical Herbalist Wellness Counselor and Bear Medicine Herbs Founder and Herbalist www.bearmedicineherbs.com. Tommy, a practicing herbalist since 1998, combines extensive knowledge of Western Herbalism, nutrition and diet with ancient wisdom traditions from Native American and other cultures. You will love his wisdom and his open, compassionate understanding and gentle, peaceful energy.

Where: U MA Waltham Center, 240 Beaver St., Waltham

Save $5 by buying here: www.optimumhealthsolution.org/blog

Or pay $20 at the door.

Bring raw organic, unprocessed, ready to serve dish for 8 with labeled utensils or pay an extra $10.

Posted by Rev. Martha Muehe (www.essenic.com)
item.name: OHS Potluck: Tommy Priester
